sections.heading: fire protection district; false alarm; false report; violation; penalty
sections.text: Whoever willfully or maliciously shall raise a false alarm or false report of a fire in any rural fire protection district or any rural area within the State of Nebraska shall be guilty of a Class III misdemeanor.SourceLaws 1963

35-520.Rural fire protection district; false alarm; false report; violation; penalty.

Whoever willfully or maliciously shall raise a false alarm or false report of a fire in any rural fire protection district or any rural area within the State of Nebraska shall be guilty of a Class III misdemeanor.

SourceLaws 1963, c. 193, ยง 1, p. 638;Laws 1977, LB 40, ยง 170.
